.. _class_Sprite2D_method_get_rect:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Rect2<class_Rect2>` **get_rect**\ (\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Sprite2D_method_get_rect>`

è¿”å›ä»£è¡¨è¯¥ Sprite2D è¾¹ç•Œçš„ :ref:`Rect2<class_Rect2>`\ ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨å±€éƒ¨åæ ‡ã€‚å¯ç”¨äºæ£€æµ‹è¯¥ Sprite2D æ˜¯å¦è¢«ç‚¹å‡»ã€‚

\ **ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š**\ 


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    func _input(event):
        if event is InputEventMouseButton and event.pressed and event.button_index == MOUSE_BUTTON_LEFT:
            if get_rect().has_point(to_local(event.position)):
                print("æˆ‘ç‚¹ï¼")

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    public override void _Input(InputEvent @event)
    {
        if (@event is InputEventMouseButton inputEventMouse)
        {
            if (inputEventMouse.Pressed && inputEventMouse.ButtonIndex == MouseButton.Left)
            {
                if (GetRect().HasPoint(ToLocal(inputEventMouse.Position)))
                {
                    GD.Print("æˆ‘ç‚¹ï¼");
                }
            }
        }
    }
